title: WTB - A few specific T3 front/back combos
author: T3s

posts.post_title: WTB - A few specific T3 front/back combos
posts.post_content:
Hi,
Looking for a few specific T3 Turkey Red front/back combinations.  If you have them, please let me know.  Thanks!!

#79 Bell  w/Turkey Red ad-back
#84 Browne w/Turkey Red ad-back
#104 Lennox w/Turkey Red ad-back
#115 Sullivan w/Turkey Red ad-back

I would be interested in ANY condition whatsoever on the above cards.

Lastly, if you have any of the first series (1-50) "no-ad" aka "no-offer" backs available, please let me know.  I have most of them, but still need a few.

Thanks in advance,
Craig

Craig-
I checked my T3's.  I have Lennox with the TR back.  If you have one with a checklist back with equivalent eye appeal we could arrange a swap.  The other three are checklist backs.  Don't have any no-offer backs.

David McD

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/kawika_o_ka_pakipika/bbbofsfirstclass/t3turkeyreds/websize/TR104%20Lennox.jpg[/IMG]
